Uses of Package
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.model

Packages that use de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.model
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.behaviormodels This package contains the three models that you will have to override in order to implement your simulation, namely the behavior of agents, places and the evoution of context data. 
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.control With the exepction of the GUI class, this package contains all the controlling classes. 
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.externalCommand Classes in this package provide the TCP based interface to control the simulator. 
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.graphics Anything that relates to the graphical user interface of Siafu is contained in this package. 
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.graphics.controlpanel This package contains the classes relted to the Control Panel, that is, the right side panel of Siafu when a simulation is running. 
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.graphics.markers This package contains all the markers used to track agents or places (actually, Trackable instances) in the user interface. 
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.graphics.simulationarea This package contains the classes that draw the simulation area, that is, the Canvas where the agents live and thrive. 
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.model This package roughly contains all the modelled data objects. 
de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.output This package contains the simulation output printers. 
 

Classes in de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.model used by de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.behaviormodels
Agent
          Instances of the Agent class represent the simulations Agents.
Overlay
          An overlay is in essence a matrix which maps a value to each position of the simulated world.
Place
          Places define a position in the simulated world.
World
          This class represents the world being simulated.
 

Classes in de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.model used by de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.control
SimulationData
          The subclasses of SimulationData encapsulate the simulation information, including the agent, world and context models, the configuration file, the image maps and the sprites.
Trackable
          An interface for objects that can be tracked on the simulation, that is, objects that have a position and can be marked with a Marker.
World
          This class represents the world being simulated.
 

Classes in de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.model used by de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.externalCommand
Agent
          Instances of the Agent class represent the simulations Agents.
Place
          Places define a position in the simulated world.
Position
           This class represents a position in the simulator map.
Trackable
          An interface for objects that can be tracked on the simulation, that is, objects that have a position and can be marked with a Marker.

Classes in de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.model used by de.uniol.inf.is.odysseus.aalso.model
Agent
          Instances of the Agent class represent the simulations Agents.
Gradient
          This class is used to generate and query the distance gradients that help the Siafu Agents to navigate.

          An overlay is in essence a matrix which maps a value to each position of the simulated world.

          Places define a position in the simulated world.
